content: to great excitement in our house the new series of dr who started last night 1 with a new monster the adipose babies 1 *dr who confidential* explained they were cgi-ed but also they had a couple of knitted ones on set ooooh i have white wool hmmmm so after a quick rummage in the oddments box i made one crocheted rather than knitted as it s quicker and i find it easier to improvise in crochet i worked on it while we watched the old dr who & the daleks episodes this is more of a guide than a fully formed pattern yarn hook and gauge gauge are not specified i used dk weight yarn 11 wpi with a 3 5 mm hook but any yarn would work use a hook a size or two smaller than normal for the yarn you choose so that you make a tight fabric * 1 1 new dr who series 4 2 episode 1 partners in crime* 1 http //www bbc co uk/doctorwho/s4/episodes/ episode=s4_01&amp character=&amp action=videostream&amp playlist=/doctorwho/playlists/s4_01/video/s4_01_v_01 xml&amp video=1&amp date=&amp summary=captain%20jack%20reveals%20facts %20figures%20and%20top%20secret%20info%20about%20the%20adipose &amp info=&amp info2=&amp info3= 2 http //www bbc co uk/doctorwho/s4/episodes/
